lead_paragraph: The lead Russian contractor for the International Space Station says it plans to build the first hotel in space to cash in on a growing market for private tourism, a senior executive told Reuters on Thursday.
snippet: The lead Russian contractor for the International Space Station says it plans to build the first hotel in space to cash in on a growing market for private tourism.

headline.main: Fly Me to the Moon: Russian Firm Plans Space Hotel

abstract: The lead Russian contractor for the International Space Station says it plans to build the first hotel in space to cash in on a growing market for private tourism.
